document_data.name: Seventy-Two Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Seventy-Two Society''' was a secret society in [[Shou Lung]].
document_data.Description: The Seventy-Two Society (its name chosen only for [[feng-shui]] reasons) was officially a merchant club in [[Wa K'an]]. In truth, it sought the independence of Wa K'an from Shou Lung and was massively infiltrated by agents of the [[shogun]] of [[Wa]].
